title: Settings
subtitle: Manage your account, organization, and application preferences.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your personal information, avatar, and account details.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Configure email and in-app notification preferences.

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: Manage organization details, branding, and general settings.

team.title: Team Management
team.description: Invite team members, manage roles, and set permissions.

billing.title: Billing
billing.description: Manage your subscription, payment methods, and invoices.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Connect third-party apps and manage API integrations.

help.title: Need Help?
help.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Check our documentation or contact support.

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.emailCannotChange: Email cannot be changed. Contact support if you need to update your email.
profile.sessionDescription: These are devices that are currently signed in to your account. Sign out any sessions that you don't recognize.
profile.mfaDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
profile.confirmDisableMfa: Are you sure you want to disable MFA?

organization.title: Organization Settings
organization.name: Organization Name
organization.invalidLogoType: Invalid file type. Please upload JPEG, PNG, WebP, or SVG.
organization.confirmDeleteLogo: Are you sure you want to delete the organization logo?
organization.ownerOnly: Note: Some settings can only be modified by the organization owner.

branding.title: Branding
branding.logoHelp: PNG, JPG up to 2MB. Recommended size: 200x200px
branding.logoDesc: Upload your company logo for a branded experience.
branding.colorsDesc: Customize the primary and secondary colors of your platform.
branding.errorFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload PNG, JPG or SVG.
branding.errorFileSize: File too large. Maximum size is 2MB.

team.title: Team Management
team.removeSelfError: You cannot remove yourself from the team
team.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from your team?

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Connect your favorite tools to ADSapp to automate your workflow.

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Use API keys to authenticate requests to the ADSapp API.
apiKeys.nameHelp: Choose a descriptive name to identify this key
apiKeys.securityWarning: For security reasons, you won't be able to see this key again. Store it securely.
apiKeys.label: Your API Key
apiKeys.revokeConfirm: Are you sure you want to revoke the API key "{name}"? Any applications using this key will no longer be able to authenticate.
apiKeys.firstKey: Generate your first API key to get started
apiKeys.generatedSuccess: API key generated successfully. Make sure to copy it now!

language.title: Language Preference
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the ADSapp interface.
language.error: Failed to save. Please try again.
language.note: The page will reload to apply your new language preference.

provider.title: WhatsApp Provider
provider.description: Choose which WhatsApp provider to use for sending and receiving messages.

cloudApi.name: Meta Cloud API
cloudApi.description: Direct integration with Meta's WhatsApp Business Cloud API. Best for high-volume messaging.

twilio.name: Twilio
twilio.description: Send and receive WhatsApp messages through Twilio. Includes advanced features like templates and delivery tracking.

fallback.title: Fallback Provider
fallback.description: Automatically switch to this provider if the primary provider is unavailable.

provider.readonly: Only organization owners and admins can change provider settings.
provider.noProviders: No WhatsApp providers configured. Please configure at least one provider in Integrations.
